#numbers to month names, not done yet
#numbers to month function, generalized?
monthnum_to_names <- function(column) {
  #create dataframe with a singlecolumen with numbers 1-12
  #number <- c(1:12) 
  found <- rep(NA, length(column))
  df <- data.frame(found)
  #check if number is between 1-12
  df$found <- ifelse(sapply(column, dplyr::between, x = column, left = 1, right = 12))
 
  #if df$found is TRUE
  if (df$found == "TRUE") {
    column <-mutate(month_name = month.name[column])
  } 
}

monthnum_to_names(cdc$month)

cdc$month

#shiny app stuff (move over later) to toggle between tables and months??
#table for attendance data, with reactable? meant for shiny app will move it to the app once I know whats going on

library(shiny)
library(reactable)

table_attendance <- cmap2020 %>% 
  filter(state_abb == "OR") %>% 
  select(county_name, fips, total_students, number_schools, share_all_closed_50) %>% 
  rename("Ratio of Schools with at least 50% vistor decline from 2019" = share_all_closed_50)


ui <- fluidPage(
  reactableOutput("table")
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  output$table <- renderReactable({
    reactable(table_attendance)
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
